title: Tannin-assisted interfacial polymerization towards COF membranes for efficient dye separation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16510-16519
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02838D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Weishan Deng, Zezhen Zhang, Lulu Liu, Zekun Zhou, Lili Wu
Tannic acid-assisted interfacial polymerisation co-deposited COF to form a stable selective layer. Membrane demonstrated strong hydrophilicity, high flux, a small water contact angle, excellent separation performance, high dye inhibition rate, membrane stability and durability, and recyclability.
